sentences.sCn: 不同种族间的通婚已经变得很常见。

sentences.sContent: Women’s groups have become a commonplace.
sentences.sCn: 妇女团体已经成了常见事物。

synos.tran: 老生常谈；司空见惯的事；普通的东西

remMethod.val: common(普通)+place(地方)→普通之处→平凡的

trans.tranOther: happening or existing in many places, and therefore not special or unusual

trans.tranCn: 寻常的事物；平庸的东西
trans.tranOther: something that happens or exists in many places, so that it is not unusual
